stories.text:
Hey all, I am Sandeep. I am from Kolkata, India. I am currently working for one of the biggest e-Sports companies based in Los Angeles, USA.

I have been working remotely since 2018 and it has enabled me to level up my developer journey. In 2021, I am able to earn 7x of what I was making in 2018, all thanks to remote work.

The current scenario of finding a remote job is pretty difficult. All the remote job boards are either too colourful or very hard to browse.

That's why I started a side project of mine, it's called https://remotefront.io I am building this for the last year. As a remote worker myself, I tried to solve my own problems with this project. It has been able to collect 2500+ remote jobs from the Internet in the last 28 days.

It aggregates remote jobs from 10+ popular remote job boards and provides a cleaner way of browsing.

Every Monday & Thursday it will send you a list of remote jobs that match your preferences.

It frees up your time and hunts remote jobs for you in async.

I am looking for feedback and criticism.
stories.title: Collected 2500 remote jobs from the Internet in 28 days
